oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mrs. E.L. Thomas and Edwin Thomas Collins
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mrs. E.L. Thomas and grandson Edwin Thomas Collins , in front of home on Bluff Drive, Sequoyah Hills, Knox County, TN. Ca. 1935. Edwin is dressed in a cowboy outfit.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits; Families; Children; Cowboys;
